channel.description: Appendix B: Sample RHCSA Exam 2 Started at 13:15 on the first timer Setup for Sample Exam 2: Build a virtual machine with RHEL 9 Server with GUI Use a 20GB disk for the OS with default partitioning. Add 1x400MB disk and a network interface. (.381GiB in Virt-Manager) Do not configure the network interface or create a normal user account during installation. Tasks: Task 01: Using the nmcli command, Configure a network connection on the primary network device: IP address 192.168.0.242/24, gateway 192.168.0.1, and nameserver 192.168.0.1. Use different IP assignments based on your lab environment. *done
